mapper.select: SELECT e.emp_name AS empName, e.emp_login_id AS empLoginId, e.emp_login_pw AS empLoginPw, e.emp_sn AS empSn, e.emp_phone AS empPhone, e.emp_addr AS empAddr, e.emp_addr_detail AS empAddrDetail, e.emp_addr_zipcode AS empAddrZipcode, e.emp_photo AS empPhoto, e.use_yn AS useYn, e.reg_date AS regDate, e.reg_emp_sn AS regEmpSn, e.mod_date AS modDate, e.mod_emp_sn AS modEmpSn, e.del_date AS delDate FROM employee AS e WHERE e.emp_login_id = #{empId}
select IF(COUNT(*) = 1, 1, 0) from employee as e where e.emp_login_id = #{empId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO employee (emp_name, emp_login_id, emp_login_pw, emp_sn, emp_phone, emp_addr, emp_addr_detail, emp_addr_zipcode, emp_photo, reg_date, reg_emp_sn) VALUES (#{empName}, #{empLoginId}, #{empLoginPw}, #{empSn}, #{empPhone}, #{empAddr}, #{empAddrDetail}, #{empAddrZipcode}, #{empPhoto}, NOW(), 0)
